synopsis.text: Queen Angelique Limoges embarks on a mission to gather the perilous Sacrea gems, which possess the power to jeopardize the entire cosmos if mishandled. As part of the Gemme Stories trilogy, this anime follows Angelique's quest to secure these gems until suitable individuals can be found to become their Guardians. However, when Zephel, a trusted aide, becomes distracted and misplaces one of these precious stones, the fate of the universe hangs in the balance. With the stakes higher than ever, can Zephel rectify his mistake and safeguard the cosmos from impending doom? Join Angelique and Zephel in "Angelique: Seichi yori Ai o Komete" as they navigate this thrilling and complex adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
